nl.BobbinWork.bwlib.gui
Class Localizer

java.lang.Object
  nl.BobbinWork.bwlib.gui.Localizer

public class Localizer
extends java.lang.Object

Manager of language specific strings. An application should provide a single set of property files (a bundle) collecting the key value pairs for all the packages using this class.

The applyStrings methods sets language specific string properties of components as far as applicable for the type of component and as far available in the set of properties files.

The properties and suffixes are:

  • text
  • mnemonic - underline
  • accesibleName - accesibleName
  • toolTipText - hint (new lines are replaced by <br>, the result embedded in <html><body>...</body></html>)
For the caption of a component no suffix is applied. Suffixes can take several forms: with or without starting capitals for words in the suffix, with our without underscores preceding the words in the suffix.

Author:
J Pol
